summary: In Riverwood, a Lockbox is washed down the river. It contains a Mother's last gift for their child. This one has no magic on it.
descriptionHtml:
[b]This mod was created as a request for a version of the pendant without magic.

Short Version[/b]
In Riverwood, a Lockbox is washed down the river. It contains a Mother's last gift for their child. This one has no magic on it.
[font=Courier New][size=4]
[b]Note: Do [i]NOT[/i] install this mod with the [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/57891/?]magic one[/url], they share the same location/id on the map![/b][/size][/font]

[b]Slightly Longer Version
[/b]This mod adds a lockbox across the river from the woodpile/mill. Inside is a
letter and "A Mother's Pendant" enchanted with Muffling. As for what
happened to the mother and child? Who knows.

[b]Quick "How To Find" Guide
[/b][list=1][*][b]Fast Travel To Riverwood[/b][/*]
[*][b]Enter the Town until you get to the first fork in the road[/b][/*]
[*][b]Turn Left, follow till you get to the river.[/b][/*]
[*][b]Look on the other side of the river, near the edge until you find the lockbox.[/b][/*]
[/list]
author: Darkdatatrc
